sentence.Network_en: Local long - haired types and even a few tourists - pitch in to help from time to time.
sentence.Network_cn: 当地蓄长头发的年青人,甚至还有几个旅游者振臂相助.

sentence.Network_en: We've heard parents comment unfavorably about long - haired toy animals.
sentence.Network_cn: 对于长毛型的玩具动物,我们听到有些家长们评语不佳.

sentence.Network_en: Long - haired pelts are selling well.
sentence.Network_cn: 大毛的市场销售情况真不错.
